org.jslipc.ipc.pipe

Class JslipcPipeURLConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.net.URLConnection
      • org.jslipc.ipc.pipe.JslipcPipeURLConnection

  • public class JslipcPipeURLConnection
extends URLConnection
    This is an URLConnection based on a JslipcPipe.
